name: Posted
description:
You are the post cat in your village, after an extra long cat nap you are now running late on your morning deliveries. You must hurry to get all the mail posted in time, and possibly a couple of parcels if you have time to spare.

You can set how long you have to make your deliveries in the settings panel, you can choose between 1 to 10 minutes, the colour of your cat can also be chosen here as well as other settings, the credits are also located in the settings panel.

There are upgrades scattered around the village to help you carry more mail or give you more time, these are randomly generated so can be in many different locations.

There are some improvements to be made in the future, more villager variants like dogs/rabbits/hedgehogs, more house model variants, more upgrades, better refined textures and models and smarter AI to name a few.
